title: Verizon reveals new prepaid data plans, raises unlimited data cost
text:
Verizon reveals new prepaid data plans, raises unlimited data cost 
Published By: MacNN.com - Today 
Verizon is giving customers who use their LTE-equipped tablets and other devices sparingly more options for connecting to the wireless netwo...
